description.narrative: The legal, institutional and technical capacities of the government structures at the central, provincial and municipal levels are enhanced and they contribute to the promotion of WASH activities and the sustainable management of WASH facilities.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The legal, institutional and technical capacities of the government structures at the central, provincial and municipal levels are enhanced and they contribute to the promotion of WASH activities and the sustainable management of WASH facilities.

description.narrative: In 2018, UNICEF Burundi continued its comprehensive approach to enhance national capacity and accountability in the WASH sector through the promotion of system sustainability and risk-informed planning for community resilience. UNICEF Burundi was designated the lead agency for the WASH sector development partners group. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018
